forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. West southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Labor Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 17 mph.

weather_report:
The quiet of the early morning in Downtown San Francisco offers a canvas of stillness, marked by mostly clear skies. The air is cool and calm, a gentle whisper of wind rustling at approximately eight miles per hour, creating a serene backdrop as the city begins to stir awake. As the day unfolds, a bright sun will claim dominance, ushering in warmer temperatures that will rise to a comfortable seventy-four degrees before settling down to around seventy-two in the afternoon. 

While the forecast suggests a mostly sunny day, the embrace of fog may be waiting just offshore, hinting at the enigmatic dance between ocean and land that San Francisco knows so well. For those venturing out, lightweight layers might be the best choice, allowing for a seamless transition as the day warms, yet providing comfort against the brisk marine breeze. This is an ideal day to stroll along the waterfront, perhaps sipping a freshly brewed coffee while watching the boats linger in the harbor, or seeking out the quiet allure of a local park, where shade can be found beneath the trees as the sun climbs higher.
